data.description:
Made for Oculus Quest, Moon VR Home is an app for you to discover, preview, and install diverse virtual environments for your headset.

Where would you like to set up your home in the Metaverse? On a spaceship, in a winter resort, or in a furnished sunroom?

Unlock your new VR Home with:
-Mixed Reality Portal: Enter any virtual world from your room
- 30,000+ AI-Generated Skybox: Create a unique skybox by describing and one-click save it. NO sideload needed!
- Hundreds of Custom Home environments by artists from all over the world
- Edit and customize unique home environments with your own files
- In-app 360° panoramic preview before downloading
- Wirelessly download and install the environments

Browse, preview, and download the environments to customize your VR home with Moon VR!

IMPORTANT: With your initial download, you'll receive 5 generation quotas to get you started. Get additional quotas within the app when needed.

Welcome join our discord: https://discord.gg/3wKdfqUydY

changelog.change_log:
“v1.5.8:
New Feature:
-Explore 3D environments Mixed Reality Portal.
-Randomize your 3D environment or skybox.
-Easily delete your history in Account > Creations.
Bug fixed.”

“v1.5.7:
3 New Custom Homes Added.
New Features:
-Add models in Mixed Reality Portal.
-View local images in immersive&mixed reality mode.
-Access skybox favorites & creations.
-Introducing new Portals.
UX & UI Tweaks:
-Custom Homes Download List refined.
-Tooltips for menu clarity.
Greetings:
-Happy holidays!”

Greetings:
-Happy holidays!:gift:”

“v1.5.6:
-New Feature: view your local images both in immersive mode and mixed reality portal!
-Access your skybox favorites & creations in portal.
-New Portal Added.
-Merry Christmas!!!”

“v1.5.4
- In-App Purchase: Unlock more AI generations.
- Community Content in Portal: Explore community creations.
- Performance and Visual Enhancements: Enjoy a smoother experience.
- More ‘Portals’ (Beta): Discover additional options of Anywhere Portal.”

“-New feature:  the Portal--- Seamlessly Connect the ‘Virtual’ and ‘Reality’ Worlds.
-Generation Trial Gift Package included”

“-New AI Prompt Enhancer Feature: Elevate your descriptions with a single toggle switch.
-Added Sorting Option to Skybox Gallery.
-Fine-tuned UI for an improved user experience.”

“- Introducing 「Remix」: Refine and recreate your version using existing skybox as a foundation.
- 「Negative Prompt」 option: Describe what to avoid in the skybox.
-「Clear」on keyboard: clear input with just one click
- Password complexity tweaked.
- UI enhanced: Enhance your experience by seperating user-generated content from the Skybox Creation panel.”

- Introducing 「Remix」: Refine and recreate your version using existing skybox as a foundation.
- 「Negative Prompt」 option: Describe what to avoid in the skybox.
-「Clear」on keyboard: clear input with just one click
-  Password complexity tweaked.
- UI enhanced: Enhance your experience by seperating user-generated content from the Skybox Creation panel.

”-Input functionality optimized: added the cursor, and now you can use the ray to insert and modify the prompt words!
-Keyboard UX enhanced: increased keyboard response sensitivity.
-Style name included in the community skybox names.“
